name: Mushroom Madness (stev_annunz)
description:
MUSHROOM MADNESS is a FPS/Card game about killer mushrooms. As a true wizard, you always have a few tricks up your sleeve to make sure you survive as long as possible!

This game was made in one week for the Genre Mash Jam. The following assets were made before the jam started:

  • The music, made by Bensound and Kevin MacLeod
  • The player movement system (later heavily modified)
  • The script which mades the book hover up and down

I made a quick modification to fix a game-breaking bug after the jam ended. I'm open to all feedback. Thanks for playing!
